website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic choice for panini sandwiches, vegetables, and of course, steaks, this taller indoor grill was designed to sear your food for 90 seconds to preserve its juiciest flavors, before quickly grilling it to delicious perfection.
pros: Dedicated Sear Button locks in flavors and juices before grilling your food
Large hinge fits sandwiches, steaks, and bigger foodstuffs
cons: While it may appear like it may open up wide for tabletop grilling, this is exclusively a press grill

customer_reviews.title: Quality - Great Price and Grills Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: After spending a loooong time reviewing these indoor grills, I must say I’m very happy with my purchase. First time using it today I grilled a tri tip steak. It was done in about 10 minutes to perfection. I can’t comment about any smoke because the steak grilled was very lean. I suppose a meat with a higher fat content would obviously lend itself to smoke issues. Clean up was super easy. Turn it off, lay a damp paper towel on it and close the lid for approximately 30 seconds. Use your tongs on the paper towel to easily remove any residue. Cleaned up absolutely spotless. I mean seriously, you can’t beat the quality for under 50.00.
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: This grill is so good. I've had George Foreman grills before
customer_reviews.text: This grill is so good. I've had George Foreman grills before, but I like this one better. I love that you can control the temperature. Also, since there are plates on the top and bottom, it makes for faster and even cooking. It's not that hard to clean - I use a grill brush when the plates are still hot and then I'll wipe down with a damp paper towel before I put the grill away. Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Glued on Piece Snapped off
customer_reviews.text: This would be a good product except for the fact that the protector on the top part of the grill that allows the top section to be manipulated a little bit and protects people from burning themselves broke off after only 3 months! Why did it break? because the piece was only attached by a flimsy metal wire and glue! Other than the fact that the product broke after only 3 months, I will note that it is a pain to clean since the grill doesn't come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: I don't cook meat without this anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I should just throw out my frying pan!! I am absolutely delighted with this product. I've made salmon, chicken, turkey burgers. asparagus, peppers & fajitas with this grill. Food comes out deliciously and extremely fast! Plus it's healthy! I would definitely recommend this product. It's well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stellar Starshine

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach 25331 Super Sear Grill
customer_reviews.text: After using a Rocket Grill with parchment paper envelopes for years decided to purchase Hamilton Beach Super Sear Grill. Very glad I did because it grills hamburgers, chicken and steaks and is much better at sealing in the juices. It is also very easy to clean and you do not need a brush. Wet paper towel and tongs is all you need. Great grill for two people and excellent for apartment size counters. Have grilled daily since March 31st delivery and it has been a great experience. A wonderful buy at $38.69 and worth every penny even at regular price.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvan

customer_reviews.title: Good grill/ pain to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grill, works good and it heats just fine. I actually run it at it’s lowest setting because these small Eletric grills tends to burn food easily. Love the searing function use it every time I cook meats. Took off a star because cleaning this thing sucks. It does not have removable plates and it’s not waterproof. I still wet mine pretty good when I wash it but do it at your own risk. Overall good grill.
customer_reviews.author: Appollo Scott

customer_reviews.title: Price & Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I am so happy with the indoor grill. Highly recommend it. I purchased the model the has the temperature control which makes it easier to cook food. Grilled frozen chicken breasts and frozen turkey burgers in 7 mins. They came out perfect - not dried out. Clean up was very easy. Used a wet soapy sponge - let it set for a few minutes - then wiped it off with a paper towel. Manual lists some foods and recommended temps. and grilling times. Definitely a 10. PS: It also allows you to sear foods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Good but Cord is Short
customer_reviews.text: Bought about a month ago. Was looking for something that you could set the temp on to replace my George Foreman grill. This was about half the price of a comparable GF grill. Have used this at least a dozen times. Works great! The manual says to clean put a wet paper towel after use. It works GREAT! Wish i knew it before. Only knock is the cord is very short. I'm sure for some safety reason.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Well executed electric grill
customer_reviews.text: After using GF grills the last 5 years and having to replace them die to the non-stick surface wearing out easily, I gave this a try. It is the perfect size and just a little bigger than the GF. Non-stick works well and is easy to clean (non removable). Sear function works well. Cooking is very even though I think you get better looking results with turning it as least once and glazing with a little drippings or butter. If it last 2+ years, I will be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Still in Awe
customer_reviews.text: At my house this thing does it all. We use it as a grill, a panini press, etc. THOROUGHLY impressed by it so much so that we use it multiple times a week for all types of food. Cant beat that its easy to use and easy to clean, even cheese and jelly from PB & J sandwiches(don't ask) come off wipe the wipe of a wet towel. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: michael williams

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by this grill. Great grill.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the types of indoor grills for >10yrs 3-5 times a week. Pleasantly surprised how great this grill works. Its just the perfect size. Although the plates are not removable, it is lightweight and easy to clean. It heats fast and evenly. Gets nice and hot for searing steaks, also has a special sear function. Would buy it again. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: I use it for everything. Sandwhiches, burgers, steaks, pork chops, chicken even frozen potato puffs for hash browns. I use this 98% of the time for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Even some sandwhich desserts. I just love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rohnda

customer_reviews.title: What a AWESOME INDOOR GRILL
customer_reviews.text: I love my new indoor Hamilton Beech Grill!!!🥰🥰 I made salmon the very first night that I got it which was Thursday night it was superb done to perfection. I would highly recommend this indoor grill at Harley takes up any space on your counter it's awesome easy to clean it's just great thank you Hamilton Beach
customer_reviews.author: April Dingwell

customer_reviews.title: do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: worked for a few times only- never actually seared meat - do not purchase
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: 25331 searing grill
customer_reviews.text: just got this, used it all weekend. The sear feature is good but doesn't seem to do what my ole George Foreman does really too soon to tell. Its good for the price but Im on the fence rt now using it.. To clean after it is turned off is to put a double wet paper towel and shut the lid but if you forget it, its no ezier to clean as any of them.. just ok for me
customer_reviews.author: bobby atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Super easy to clean so don't fret about the fact that you can't remove the grills. No problem, just place a wet cotton dish towel covering the hot grill after turning off. I just let it set while we eat and clean it up later with paper towels. You have to adjust cooking time to your preferred taste. A few over cooked meals but think I'm getting the hang of it. It's easy, super quick and tasty. My kind of cooking!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Faulk

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about getting this new grill. The description was enticing, but quite honestly I prefer my old George Forman grill. It wasn’t fancy, didn’t have all the bells and whistles this one has, just plug in and grill. This one supposedly sears the meat, adjusts temperature. I found them useless. Takes longer to heat and cleaning isn’t easy. The grill plate doesn’t come off.
customer_reviews.author: Nan W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this indoor grill/panini maker!
customer_reviews.text: This griddle/ pamini maker cooks burgers, steaks, portabello mushrroms, veggies, perfectly. Just follow directions on the insert. Leaves gtill marks like an outdoor grill. Makes great sandwiches as well. We use sliced italisn bread and have made some phnomenal grilled cheese sandwiches! Very easy to use, easy to clean. Note: some exterior surfaces can get hot, so be sure to use a mitt and item should not be used by a child without an adult present.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hecht

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS GRILL!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this grill. All the meat I love, I can cook on this grill. I use the cook times in the booklet as a guide( I add 5 min) and my food comes out just right. Very easy to clean. The wet paper towel while it's still hot works great. Then after I eat and the grill has cooled off. I use OXO Good Grips Electric Grill and Panini Press Brush to clean it. Then wipe it down with a wet sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it and did for a short 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a grill with plates that weren't removable and I will never again make the same mistake. Have had this grill for just over 3 months. Plates are a real pain to clean regardless of the advice to put wet paper towels on the hot plates. We clean this grill very carefully, never using anything that would scratch and after only 3 months, the non-stick is coming off. Now, obviously, plates can't be replaced so the entire grill has to be replaced. Next one will have removable plates!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good sear!
customer_reviews.text: I've made pretty much everything on here since purchasing 4 weeks ago. This is my first indoor grill and I LOVE IT! Clean up is a cinch (recommend using a very wet paper towel, not a damp one). Do be careful, though, because this grill gets hot! My (29 y.o.) niece bought one after my raves and she wasn't being very careful and the hot lid fell on her hand and burned her pretty badly. Be careful when the lid is up! Great for chicken breasts, fish, steak, pork chops, all veggies, pineapples, peaches, toasty sandwiches, scallops, shrimp - I use it for everything except eggs! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control is a big plus
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the unattached fat drain-it doesn't stay in place. The grill works well otherwise. Also would prefer if the grill plate was removable for more thorough cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Can NOT clean it!
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and they were all great ! I received it and used it one time and I can tell you don’t buy it! This thing is impossible to clean! The plates do not detach! I’m not sure how some people said you just “wipe it down” but I happen to like to eat off of clean surface and I can tell you that “wiping it down” does not clean it! It cooked the food great, grease drained like it should! But good luck cleaning this thing! One use and I’m never using it again! Waste of $40
customer_reviews.author: Anas Afana

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC GRILL...I GUARANTEE U WILL AGREE
customer_reviews.text: Ease of using! Cleaning! Great Sear Marks,! Cooked Delmonico Steak. Husband thought i ordered it!! So very happy i ordered this grill. Even looks better than when i cook on outside grill ! Buy this grill i know you will be surprised!! I guarantee u will love it !
customer_reviews.author: maryD2

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and that it drains the grease away. I use parchment paper so a quick wipe of the drain groove and it is clean. Cooks quickly. I live alone and love this grill to make myself a chicken breast or hamburger.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Grilled hotdogs for lunch and hamburgers for dinner. Grilled quicker than I thought it would and it wasn’t burnt. The way I suppose to clean up with a wet paper towel kinda didn’t work. Other than that it was awesome 👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Pittman

customer_reviews.text: Update: stopped working after 2 months I had zero luck with chicken before this bad boy and I've used it 6 times since I've had it! Easy to clean just followed the directions they gave in the manual!
customer_reviews.author: cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I use it every day burgers pork chops chicken lamb shrimp fish. I can grill almost anything on it food taste amazing very easy to clean very easy to use and very easy to store. Can’t go wrong with this item
customer_reviews.author: Tru

customer_reviews.title: The Jury is out....not looking favorable.
customer_reviews.text: Product is less than one year old and no longer working. I reached out to customer service, check back to this review for the response from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: dfzsghas

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Indoor Grill
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to set actual temperature as well as the 500 degree sear function. Produces no smoke at all, only some steam when cleaning. Could be a little easier to clean - be prepared to use several paper towels and several minutes to get the job done, especially after grilling meats.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: I like the grill for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m upset because I never got my drip tray and I don’t know how to get one I don’t want to return the whole grill for just one part.. kinda ridiculous but other than that the top and bottom of the grill does heat which is nice but the timer has a high pitch beep so if you are hard of hearing you won’t hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Smokeless Electric Grill
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this grill. Its perfect for up to four. Absolutely no smoke and wonderful flavor. It’s so easy to clean. Make sure to follow cleaning instructions. Shirley
customer_reviews.author: Coy

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Cooked steaks to perfection! I've used for meats, veggies and browning bread. Love this product because it of it's convenience and it get's hot enough to seer a ribeye. Easy to clean and small , easy to store away.
customer_reviews.author: Karine A Bucci

customer_reviews.title: Replace my Foreman Grill
customer_reviews.text: Its okay I bought it to replace my small Foreman grill. but the cord is too short and therefore not able to use it with ease on my counter especially when open. Keep in mind that it gets VERY HOT quickly. Would be nice if they explained better rare/medium/well done in the book. Along with the Sear. It doesn't bother me that you need wet paper towels to clean but it still doesn't clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: Barak1946

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an Optigrill which lasted a whole six months before the circuit board went out. So far, I’ve grilled burgers, fish, grilled cheese sandwiches, and French toast with complete success. This really is a fantastic little grill. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Incredible indoor grill!
customer_reviews.text: As a Florida native, I never understood the need for an indoor grill until I moved north. I did a lot research and compared a lot of grills before settling on the Hamilton Beach Super Sear. It is incredible. I followed all the advice about steaming it clean with a wet papertowel and have found it VERY easy to clean. It sure beats cleaning grease splatter from trying to pan fry items. It makes the BEST bacon and makes it quick. I really like the adjustable temperature feature. I would highly recommend this product. It's sturdy. It's large and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: johnsoa2

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 3 months no longer works 40 bucks down the drain thanks....
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with my purchase. The grill gets hot fast and stays hot. The surface is easy to clean (throw a wet paper towel on it after you're done cooking and the steam will loosen everything!). My only complaint (and the reason it lost 1 star) is that the metal part of the handle (the parts to the left and right of the black part of the top handle) get really hot! If you're not paying attention and grab that part...be ready! Oh, and the beep to tell you it's ready is really loud! Which could be good or bad, depending on who's sleeping at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Only just got it but boy does it make cooking my chicken and steak a breeze i can do other things and set my timer
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Never worked correctly. Just get error message when turning it on. I'm going back to my old grill.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fischer

customer_reviews.title: not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a glorified sandwich press. I bought to grill some steaks at a food show for presentation. Basically steamed the meat. No grill marks whatsoever. I tested 6 diff steaks and noting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Juices drip out the back after you open lid when done cooking
customer_reviews.text: It cooks fine, but leaks everywhere out the back after your food is cooked. Chicken and burgers leave juices on the top plate that drip downthrough the back when you open ot to take your food out. I bought this to save time but the time saved cooking cancels itself out with cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: dapperdan

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Large surface area...3 large chicken breasts fit easily. Giving 4 stars because I only received the other day and unsure of durability at this time. Took note of reviews and cleaned with wet paper towel while grill was warm. Great advice, but will take time to learn how to clean more quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Lambrecht

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy for the price !!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed pretty good indoor grill heats right up as instructed in the manual and cooks pretty good only problem sometime cooks the meat outside faster than the inside so I just finish in the oven but other than that easy to clean usually let it cool down all the way and clean it the next morning or day ! For safety for the price it’s a nice buy!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Dent

customer_reviews.title: Great for toasted sandwiches/ panini.
customer_reviews.text: We use it mainly for toasted panini style ham/cheese sandwiches and it's great. Can fit 4 small size (loaf type) bread type or 2-3 larger sourdough traditional loaf bread. Sandwiches come out with crisp texture and melty interior. Does not burn them even when we left them longer. Have also used it for hot dogs and pita bread.
customer_reviews.author: YO

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these for awhile now and this is my first. These type grills have come a long way since the first George Forman grill. After comparing a lot of them (and boy there's a lot!)I settled on the HB. I gotta say for my first one it does everything I want it to. Grills even,quick and cleans up easy.What else do you want. Just know the grill plates do not come off and you can't have a flat surface option but all in all this is a good buy for just doin meat and veggies. My next one I will want the flat surface option which for sure will cost more.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: If you want to grill indoors, this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced one that I used for 4 years that stopped getting hot. The new one does a great job on steaks and chops. I can cook a ribeye steak to medium rare in about 6 minutes. Easy to use, and very easy to clean since the grilling plates are removable.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Deutchman

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The only flaw is the plates are not removable. Other than that works great and it's super convenient and keeps me from grilling on 107°heat
customer_reviews.author: Davina

customer_reviews.title: Let's try again
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time this week. My chicken breast could have been a little more moist (only cooked it 8 minutes like the directions said). Hopefully the more I use it, it will get easier
customer_reviews.author: skibum

customer_reviews.title: This grill is great and use it all of the time
customer_reviews.text: This grill is great and use it all of the time. Will most likely buy another when this doesn't work properly anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that the grill did not have removable grids. I should have not worried. The instructions suggest a wet paper towel on the hot surfaces when done. One does need tongs with protection over the metal (silicone or other) but the clean up is rapid. The heat control is fabulous allowing the surface to superheat (500 degrees) gives great sear marks and quickly seals the meat. We have used it for burgers, steak and chicken. Fish is on the list to be done.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pendergrass

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kitchen Addition
customer_reviews.text: I really like the searing feature of the grill, it is easy to use and clean up is a breeze, just follow the clean up instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Bean

customer_reviews.title: But I love the results
customer_reviews.text: I bought this griller because broiling steaks inside in the oven made the smoke alarm go off. I wanted the grilled edges while still having a medium rare steak. This product works well. I usually grill rib eyes. I had to use the sear button, back to back, about four times to accomplish this. I believe that sear automatically stays on only about 90 seconds. I also had to take mine outside as it does get very hot and smokey. But I love the results. I also had frozen garlic bread and put this on the grill. It was perfect too.
customer_reviews.author: ValCypress

customer_reviews.title: My second one!
customer_reviews.text: Great for searing steaks! I wish the plates were removable to make clean up easier. After a while the grease get down in the crevices and it will get smoky.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Thies

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this a lot in the past few weeks. Steak, chicken , kabobs , pork chops, hotdogs and grilled cheese. Works great ! Took a few times to judge temperature. Clean up easy. Just put a wet paper towel on (after unplugging ) and dries fast and wipes fairly easy
customer_reviews.author: cherie stelzer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GRILL
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the perfect grill. It is very, very easy to clean if you just pay attention to what the instructions say. After turning off, unplug, lay a wet towel on the hot grill and close the lid. When you're finished eating and time to clean up just open the lide and wipe it all down and rinse the towel out. Really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine D.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why people don't like this!
customer_reviews.text: I quite honestly love my grill. You can throw anything on it lol. I mean, sure the "sheets" can't be removed but the cleanup is no big deal. You wet a papertowel, grill it for a couple of seconds and use tongs to wipe off the charred peices. No big deal. It works pretty fast, the times in the booklet that are recommended for the different types of meat should be followed. I haven't really grilled veggies (don't see the point?), but this thing is a great "set it and forget it" product.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin M

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Work. Smelled burnt plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Brought it. Plugged it in. Waited for it to get to temperature. Smelled like burning plastic. And it turned completely off and would not turn back on. Didn’t even put any food on it. Will send back, going back to GFs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This has been amazing in cutting down fat in my foods and the amount of time I have to spend in the kitchen after work. It does it’s job and does it well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BBQing outside is always better
customer_reviews.text: kind of stinks up the house. BBQing outside is always better, no matter the weather.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wiggman

customer_reviews.title: Fantstic Portable Grill
customer_reviews.text: Use it for camping trips and it works great! Saves room and is super easy to clean. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel M.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: It gets warm super fast and it's super easy to clean, after watch a lot of options I'm glad I picked this one!
customer_reviews.author: ShadySK

customer_reviews.title: Great prices grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill is pretty easy to clean if you wipe it down before the grease sets in. Cooks veggies and meats pretty good withought the grease, perfect for meal prep. Removable plates would have made for an easier clean-up but for the price this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Trevino-Titzman

customer_reviews.title: Better than a BBQ!
customer_reviews.text: I grilled steaks for my son and husband and we all thought that they tasted better than being bbq’d. Get this grill...you won’t regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: DENISE ROBIN DURBIN

customer_reviews.title: Meh it's just okay.
customer_reviews.text: It's just a bigger foreman griller. Works okay. Any thick cuts take forever to cook through.
customer_reviews.author: XYz

customer_reviews.title: The brand says it all
customer_reviews.text: Great over the counter grill. Love the searing indicator and the temperature control. Perfect size for stakes or multiple grill sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: FANE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean,quick meal
customer_reviews.text: Second one after 5 years. Worth it. Any meat cooks in 10 or less minutes, drains fat. Better then George forman
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: It does a great job of cooking quickly and leaving the meat juicy ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this grill about two weeks and have used it nearly every evening to cook chicken, steak or pork chops. It does a great job of cooking quickly and leaving the meat juicy and tasty. The searing program makes the brown marks and gives the meat a better taste. It's not like cooking on a gas grill outside but It's great for an indoor grill. I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Wizard

customer_reviews.title: searing feature is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I like the feature that allows you to increase the temperature on the meat, but was less excited about the cleaning the cooking plates.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Crumlish

customer_reviews.title: made very well, cooks great, a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that i tcooks from the top and bottom. Just like grilling out doors! Love the searing capability!
customer_reviews.author: karen l g

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great but makes a mess
customer_reviews.text: I was in awe at the quality of steaks and burgers I was able to turn out with this thing. It's failing is in the complete lack of splatter control it has. Grease will be everywhere within 2 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: It cooks food!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this grill. Cooks my burgers, steaks, even asparagus to perfection. Now sure how long to cook? Look in the book!
customer_reviews.author: Hometown Computers

customer_reviews.title: Best grill ever
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome grill. I even went back and bought a second one for my son going off to college. I’ve made everything from fajitas to fish on it and my guests love the way it cooks and beeps when the meat is cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Heats up to sear quickly. Since the panels aren’t removable, it’s difficult to properly clean it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use quick clean up food comes out perfect
customer_reviews.text: The searing option is awesome best investment I have made easy to use versus barbecuing and quick seals flavor in foods use for chicken fish beef vegetables amazing use the grill almost daily I ordered another one for family member I was so impressed easy clean up damp paper towel just wipe Grill off I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Diane M

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Comes with instructions on recommended cooking times of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Comes with instructions on recommended cooking times of some meats and vegetables. It's not small. So, if your sink isn't tiny, once its cools a bit, through it in the sink and scrub it clean while it's warm. It's not bad cleaning it. Let it dry, especially the plug as you don't want to hurt yourself. I think it's great and cooks fast.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied buyer
customer_reviews.text: I have cooked steaks and 1 1/2" thick pork chops, it seared the outside letting it stay nice and juicy inside. Very fast cook time! I really am glad I bought it. The cooking surface is only big enough for two New York Strip Steaks and a few mushrooms and onions. Great for a single person or couple.
customer_reviews.author: David Frankenberger

customer_reviews.title: Counter-top indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product - a bit large for my kitchen. Just didn't like the cleanup part of the process. Would rather have a dishwasher option.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this little Grill. I live in California in a small studio . It's very practical. Easy to clean. I'm in love
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's all true!
customer_reviews.text: All the good reviews are TRUE! I love this grill. Love the temp readings, searing, and clean up is easy too. It's good looking too, and pretty much fool proof. I can't wait to try out burgers, veggies and juicy steaks. I made Pork Tenderloin and chicken breasts. While I was eating, I put the damp washcloth between the plates (unplugged, of course) and by the time dinner was eaten, the gunk left on the grill wiped off easily. It's light years ahead of geo. forman grills of old. Treat yourself & the family and try this grill, you'll love it. A review by your Bunni Buddy ;-)
customer_reviews.author: A Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cooks fast
customer_reviews.text: Both sides cook no turning needed. Has a hinge so doesn't flatten food to much.
customer_reviews.author: nitakp

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s also easy to clean. As long as you let it cool off and clean soon after!
customer_reviews.author: Julissa

customer_reviews.title: and fish much better than on the stove top
customer_reviews.text: Cooks steaks, chicken, and fish much better than on the stove top. Pretty difficult to clean and keep up with though. Would be nice if the plates were somehow removable. Very short cord so have a spot picked out close to the wall .
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Only removable part is the drip tray
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, east to use, cooks food evenly and drains the fat. Food tastes perfect. Only downside is need to wipe down surfaces to clean they’re not removable which maybe a good thing mechanically. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JOY SHAKED

customer_reviews.title: Got exactly what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: I live it overall... Forget about gorge Foreman get this
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this appliance. It doesn't leave my counter top. I use it to grill chicken breast mostly and it works like a wonder.
customer_reviews.author: Juelz

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill
customer_reviews.text: I would give this grill a 5+ if I could. I grilled steaks, burgers, fries, seafood. Cooks faster than a oven. Super easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: TedWpx1@comcast

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Didn’t give it 5 stars only because the top grill and bottom grill aren’t connected in the back. There’s a gap where liquid can sometimes drop in the back. But still buy it. It’s great and cooks food fast.
customer_reviews.author: K.real

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to Foreman Grill
customer_reviews.text: Had Foreman Grills in the past, this is much better! Temp control is great, meat sear function is a nice option, overall sturdy build. Easy to clean as you'd expect with this type of grill.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Deyette

customer_reviews.title: Timesaver
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast it cooks. The food doesn't come out dry. It's so easy to clean. Great to use for everyday meals
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have it for over the year now and I love it, food is cooked really fast and the fat is gone. Healthier and taste super good
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: I love the grill
customer_reviews.text: I love the grill, the only downside is, non-removable grill plates, the grease collection cup is located on the outside of the grill, the top grill plate will drip behind the grill, so you will have a mess to clean up afterward
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Rud

customer_reviews.title: they've seemed to really enjoy it as their backup for the time being
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for a couple that loves to grill, but now they live on the 2nd floor of their apartment and are no longer allowed to use a traditional charcoal grill. While this grill obviously doesn't impart the same flavor as a charcoal grill, they've seemed to really enjoy it as their backup for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the Barbecue
customer_reviews.text: This is great for when I don't to smell like smoke after using the barbecue, just throw everything on here and it cooks real well and the meat stays moist. The grill is non-stick but it can be a pain to clean now and then, I recommend cleaning it as soon as you can after cooking it will help make the clean-up easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan O.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and cooks food well. It’s pretty difficult to clean after a use.
customer_reviews.author: Megan F.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product did not meet expectations. Stovetop and oven work better. It does make good cheese sandwiches. It roasts peppers and onions nicely but I haven’t liked any of the meat, chicken or fish I have tried. Maybe other brands work better.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Cole

customer_reviews.title: Evaluation of this product based on the experience of my son to whom it was given as a Xmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: The use of this grill has been limited so far to grilling sandwiches. The end result was achieved satisfactorily, after several attempts at repositioning the sandwiches, for they kept sliding downwards due to the sloping angle of the grill plate. Despite this, the grill heated up rather quickly and evenly distributed the heat. It was easy to operate and with time, we'll be grilling meats, poultry and fish. Hopefully, the food will stay in position and make the grilling experience a pleasurable and easy one.
customer_reviews.author: A. V. Young

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have had a T-Fall from Walmart previously and it alway cooked perfectly! This one will burn your food if you don’t watch it. Also it’s a lot harder to clean. I will be search for another brand with removable grates.
customer_reviews.author: donna townsend

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use. Easy clean up. Most of all amazing out come! Love that I could get the grille marks and sear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good temp. control. Not an esy clean up.
customer_reviews.text: Clean up is a problem. No way to remove grill plates to wash in the sink. I clean it with a paper towel while it is still hot.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Steak Lover's Electric Indoor Searing Grill, Nonstick 100 Square, Stainless Steel (25331), Black and Stainless, Medium
product_meta.description: Color:Black and StainlessSears meat for moist, tender results. Grills meats in under 10 minutes. Fat drains into removable drip tray. 100 sq. in. nonstick surface. Illuminated sear button. Black and silver.
feature_bullets: Lock in juices and flavor: 90-second sear function locks in flavor, grills to perfection searing meat for moist, tender results. Just press the illuminated sear button and the temperature surges to 500°f for 90 seconds, locking in flavor & juices. The grill then automatically switches to the desired preset cooking temperature.
Digital display and Adjustable temperature control: easily adjusts the temperature control to cook your favorite BBQ meals.
Grills up to 6 burgers or 4 large steaks: large 100 square" Surface is perfect for family meals and easily wipes clean with nonstick surface.
Cooks more than steaks, BBQ and burgers: grill hot sandwiches, paninis, fish, pizza, vegetables, fruit and more. Also great for keto and Paleo diets.
Easy to clean: a removable and dishwasher safe drip tray catches excess grease for easy clean-up.
Grill various sized cuts of meat or sandwiches: floating hinge accommodates thicker sandwiches or steaks.
Grills in 10 minutes or less: Great for a quick meal and fats drain into removable drip tray
Included Components: Hamilton Beach 25331 Super Sear 100-Square-Inch Nonstick Indoor Searing Grill
